1111010011001100 0110001100000111 1 -> sum: 0101011111010100, cout: 1
1011010001001100 0001011100110011 0 -> sum: 1100101101111111, cout: 0
1101110010011101 1101101111110010 0 -> sum: 1011100010001111, cout: 1
1100001111010100 0100100011010101 1 -> sum: 0000110010101010, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
